(run 1 (q) (eval-mko `((begin (define (appendo l s out) (disj (conj (== l '()) (== s out)) (fresh a (fresh d (fresh res (conj (conj (== (cons a d) l) (== (cons a res) out)) (appendo d s res))))))) ) (run 1 (q) (appendo (cons 'a (cons 'b '())) (cons 'c '()) q))) q))
